document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the Anthribidae (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea) of Panama, including new country records and a key to genera

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of the Anthribidae (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea) of Panama, including new country records and a key to genera

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Stenocerus amazonae
Jekel, 1855: 110
.
Type locality:
French Guiana : Cayenna and Brazil : Amazonas , not designated ( type material in MNHN).

Stenocerus blanchardi Jekel, 1855: 115
;
Wolfrum, 1929: 34
(catalog).
Type locality:
Colombia : Carthagena ( type material in MNHN).

Stenocerus brunnescens
Jekel, 1855: 112
.
Type locality:
Colombia : Carthagena ( type material in MNHN).

Stenocerus mexicanus
Jekel, 1855: 109
.
Type locality:
Mexico ( type material MNHN).

Stenocerus migratorius
Jekel, 1855: 109
.
Type locality:
Brazil ( type material in MNHN).

Stenocerus tessellatus
Jekel, 1855: 111
.
Type locality:
Colombia : Carthagena ( type material in MNHN).

Stenocerus variegatus
Motschulsky, 1875: 234
.
Type locality:
Nicaragua ( type material in NHRS?).

Stenocerus knullorum
Sleeper, 1953: 114
.
Type locality:
United States of America : Texas ( type material in OSU).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined. PANAMA : [ BOCAS DEL TORO ]: Miramar, sea level, 82°15’W 9°N , 27 Apr 1979 , [col.] H. Wolda, det. C.W. O’Brien 1981 [compared with type ] (1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014267); ídem but 24 Dic. 1978 , det. C.W. O’Brien 1980, as
Stenocerus longulus mexicanus Jekel
(1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014289); ídem but 23 Mar. 1979 , det. C.W. O’Brien 1980, as
Stenocerus longulus mexicanus Jekel
(1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014288); Corriente Grande, Río Changuinola, 9°17’30”N , 82°32’41”W , [col]. H. Wolda, Feb 17 1980 , det. C.W. O’Brien 1981 (1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014276); [ CHIRIQUÍ ] David, IV-26-60, [col.] K.W. Brown, det. C.W. O’Brien 1975 (1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014270); [ COLÓN ] Gamboa Woodlot, 9.119851[ N ] -79.694506[ W ] WGS84, 25- V-2014 , on tree trunk, [col.] S.S. Aznaldo, det. S.S. Anzaldo, 2014 as
Stenocerus longulus mexicanus Jekel
(1, SSAC: SSAC0001036); [ PANAMÁ ] Canal Zone, Madden Forest, Mile 2.5, VII-1-1974 , [cols.] C&L O’Brien & Marshal, det. C.W. O’Brien 1975 (1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014275); Canal Zone, Madden Forest, VII-3-1974 , [cols.] O’Briens & Marshall, det. C.W. O’Brien 1975 (2, ASUCOB:ASUCOB0014271, ASUCOB0014274); Las Cumbres, UV trap, May 4 1976 , [col.] H. Wolda, det. C.W. O’Brien 1981 [compared with type ] (1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014269); ídem but May 31 1976 , det. C.W. O’Brien 1981 (1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014277); ídem but 25 Sep 1976 , det. C.W. O’Brien 1977, as
Stenocerus longulus mexicanus Jekel
(1, ASUCOB:ASUCOB0014280); ídem but 28 XI 1976 , det. C.W. O’Brien 1980, as
Stenocerus longulus mexicanus Jekel
(1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014284); Las Cumbres, 1-28-VIII-1984 , Light trap, [col.] H. Wolda (1, MIUP ); [ PANAMÁ OESTE ] Canal Zone, Barro Colorado Is., UV trap 1 (
3 m .
high), 12 Nov 1976 , [col.] H. Wolda, det. C.W. O’Brien 1977, as
Stenocerus longulus mexicanus Jekel
(1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014281); idem but 26 Dic 1976 , det. C.W. O’Brien 1980, as
Stenocerus longulus mexicanus Jekel
(1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014287); ídem but 29 May 1977 , det. C.W. O’Brien 1980, as
Stenocerus longulus mexicanus Jekel
(1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014286); idem but 20 Dic 1977 , det. C.W. O’Brien 1980, as
Stenocerus longulus mexicanus Jekel
(1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014285); idem but 15 Oct 1978 , det. C.W. O’Brien 1980, as
Stenocerus longulus mexicanus Jekel
(1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014282); idem but 4 Apr 1978 , det. C.W. O’Brien 1980, as
Stenocerus longulus mexicanus Jekel
(1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014283); ídem but UV trap 3 (
26 m .
high), 16-X-1977 , [col. H. Wolda], det. C.W. O’Brien 1981 [compared with type ] (1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014268); ídem but 12 Nov 1977 , det. C.W. O’Brien 1981, as
Stenocerus longulus mexicanus Jekel
(1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014279); idem but 1-Dec-1977 , det. C.W. O’Brien 1981 (1, ASUCOB: ASUCOB0014278); Barro Colorado Island, 31-V-3-VIII-1984 , Light trap, [col.] H. Wolda (1, MIUP ); idem but 24-VIII-1984 (1, MIUP ); idem but 13-VIII-1984 (1, MIUP ); Barro Colorado Island, 22-28-IV-1987 , Light trap, Week 17 M III N (1, MEUP ); idem but 16-22-IX-1987 , Week 38 M III N (1, MEUP ); idem but 6-2-IV-1988 , Week 15 N III N (1, MEUP ); idem but 5-11-X-1988 , Week 41 N I N (1, MEUP ); idem but 21-XI-6-XII-1988 , Week 49 N III N (1, MEUP ). Note: All specimens in MIUP were mistakenly identified by H. Wolda as
Dinocentrus
sp. (now
Hylotribus Jekel
).
Note: Valentine (1980) recorded a specimen from “ Panama : Canal Zone”, without a specific location.
